scenarios.title: AI Skills Assessment and Planning
scenarios.description: Learn to evaluate and plan AI skill development for career growth

scenario.context: You want to advance your career by developing AI competencies.
scenario.challenge: What's the best approach to identify and develop relevant AI skills?

options.feedback: This unfocused approach wastes time and doesn't align with career goals.

options.text: Assess current skills, identify industry needs, and create a targeted learning plan
options.feedback: Perfect! This strategic approach aligns learning with career objectives.

options.text: Focus only on the most popular AI tools
options.feedback: Popularity doesn't guarantee relevance to your specific career path.

scenarios.title: AI-Powered Productivity Enhancement
scenarios.description: Use AI tools to improve workplace efficiency and effectiveness

scenario.context: You want to use AI to improve your daily work productivity.
scenario.challenge: How do you integrate AI tools effectively into your workflow?

options.text: Replace all manual tasks with AI automation immediately
options.feedback: Rushing into full automation without understanding can cause more problems.

options.text: Gradually integrate AI tools, evaluate their impact, and optimize workflows
options.feedback: Excellent! This measured approach ensures effective and sustainable integration.

options.text: Use AI tools without changing existing processes
options.feedback: This limits the potential benefits and may create inefficiencies.

scenarios.title: Leading AI Transformation
scenarios.description: Develop leadership skills for guiding AI adoption in organizations

scenario.context: You're leading your team's transition to AI-enhanced workflows.
scenario.challenge: How do you manage change and ensure successful AI adoption?

options.text: Mandate AI tool usage without explanation or training
options.feedback: Top-down mandates without support often lead to resistance and poor adoption.

options.text: Provide education, support, gradual implementation, and address concerns
options.feedback: Perfect! This comprehensive change management approach ensures successful adoption.

options.text: Let team members decide individually whether to use AI
options.feedback: Lack of coordination can lead to inconsistent outcomes and missed opportunities.

scenarios.title: AI Strategy and Business Value
scenarios.description: Learn to connect AI initiatives with business objectives and value creation

scenario.context: You need to justify AI investment to senior leadership.
scenario.challenge: How do you demonstrate the business value of AI initiatives?

options.text: Focus on technical capabilities and features
options.feedback: Technical features don't directly translate to business value for stakeholders.

options.text: Show clear connections between AI capabilities and measurable business outcomes
options.feedback: Excellent! This demonstrates understanding of business value and ROI.

options.text: Compare costs with competitors' AI spending
options.feedback: Competitive comparisons don't show specific value for your organization.

scenarios.title: Future-Proofing Your AI Career
scenarios.description: Develop strategies for staying relevant in an AI-driven professional landscape

scenario.context: AI is rapidly changing your industry and job requirements.
scenario.challenge: How do you ensure your career remains valuable and relevant?

options.text: Resist AI adoption to maintain traditional job functions
options.feedback: Resistance to change often leads to professional obsolescence.

options.text: Develop complementary skills, embrace AI collaboration, and focus on uniquely human value
options.feedback: Perfect! This adaptive approach leverages AI while emphasizing human strengths.

options.text: Try to compete directly with AI capabilities
options.feedback: Competing with AI on its strengths isn't sustainable; focus on human-AI collaboration.
